data.title: Cultivation License Changes at the Time of Renewal Pursuant to Business and Professions Code section 26061.5
data.excerpt: Type:  Emergency rulemaking  Status: Public notice provided January 29, 2024.   Summary: The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) is providing notice to the public of its intent to adopt its emergency regulations implementing Senate Bill 833, codified in Business and Professions Code section 26061.5, which requires the DCC to allow cultivation licensees to make certain changes at […]
